2.title: 2. Description of Service
bullets: We offer Japanese postcards for sale.

Our unique Service includes: upon your purchase and request, we will physically print the recipient's address (provided by you) onto the postcard, add appropriate Japanese postage stamps, and mail the postcard directly from Japan via Japan Post (or other specified carrier).
The intention is for the postcard to arrive at the recipient's address appearing as if sent personally from Japan.
We handle the physical mailing process; however, we rely on national and international postal services for delivery.

5.title: 5. Shipping and Delivery
bullets: We will dispatch the postcard from Japan via Japan Post standard airmail within 1-2 business days after order confirmation and payment.
Delivery times are estimates only and depend on international postal services and customs clearance in the destination country. We cannot guarantee delivery dates.
Risk of loss transfers to you (or the recipient) once we hand the postcard over to the postal carrier. We are not responsible for postal delays, loss, or damage during transit by the postal service.
We can not provide tracking for standard mail.
